title: Bug 120315: Display property set to 'none' not taking effect in new PDF emitter
OB: When the display property of an item is set to 'none' in the new PDF emitter, it does not have any effect.
EB: The display property set to 'none' should hide the item in the new PDF emitter.
SR:
To reproduce: 
1. Add a label to the document. 
2. Open the 'properties' view. 
3. Set the sectionDisplay property of the label to 'none'. 
4. Observe that the label is still visible in the new PDF emitter.
